entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 this evening then becoming light near midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Rain or snow. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the morning then changing to rain near noon. Fog patches developing near noon. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming south 40 gusting to 70 in the morning then southwest 30 gusting to 50 late in the afternoon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of drizzle or rain. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Rain changing to periods of drizzle and ending near midnight then partly cloudy. Fog patches. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 29 January 2023
